title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 141.3 - Exceptions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 141.3 - Exceptions

State Regulations

The requirements of this Part may be waived pursuant to
provisions of law by the Director of the Budget whenever he determines that
strict adherence to this Part would be detrimental to the sound and orderly
administration of State government. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
141.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
